extendedIngredients.name: ahi tuna steaks
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lb albacore tuna steaks, cut into 4 steaks

recipes.title: Spicy Pan Seared Jalapeno Tuna Steaks – 5 Points

winePairing.pairingText: Fish on the menu? Try pairing with Pinot Grigio, Gruener Veltliner, and Pinot Noir. Fish is as diverse as wine, so it's hard to pick wines that go with every fish. A crisp white wine, such as a pinot grigio or Grüner Veltliner, will suit any delicately flavored white fish. Meaty, strongly flavored fish such as salmon and tuna can even handle a light red wine, such as a pinot noir. You could try Tiamo Pinot Grigio. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.2 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 8 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Tiamo Pinot Grigio
productMatches.description: Light straw yellow color. Fresh and rich fruity aromas of apple and pear with a hint of citrus fruit that fade into the floral bouquet. Fresh and fruity, very clean and crisp.Tiamo Pinot Grigio pairs well with a wide array of lighter cuisine, especially fish/shellfish, poultry, pastas in cream sauce and softer cheeses. It's also an ideal aperitif.

recipes.instructions: InstructionsWhisk together olive oil, lime juice, garlic, jalapeno, and salt & pepper. Coat tuna steaks well with it, cover, and place in refrigerator. Allow to marinate at least 30 minutes.Spray a large, non-stick pan with non-fat cooking spray or an olive oil mister, and set over medium high heat.Cook tuna steaks about 5-8 minutes on each side, or until desired level of cooking is reached.Garnish with fresh chopped cilantro and serve immediately.

steps.step: Whisk together olive oil, lime juice, garlic, jalapeno, and salt & pepper. Coat tuna steaks well with it, cover, and place in refrigerator. Allow to marinate at least 30 minutes.Spray a large, non-stick pan with non-fat cooking spray or an olive oil mister, and set over medium high heat.Cook tuna steaks about 5-8 minutes on each side, or until desired level of cooking is reached.
Garnish with fresh chopped cilantro and serve immediately.
